item.title: AJ Towns - Schnorr Taproot
item.description: Topic: Schnorr Taproot Tapscript BIPs Location: Stephan Livera Podcast Video: https://stephanlivera.com/episode/137/ Transcript Stephan Livera: AJ, welcome to the show. AJ Towns: Howdy. Stephan Livera: Thanks for joining me AJ. I know you’re doing a lot of really cool work with the Schnorr and Taproot proposal and the review club. But let’s start with a bit of your background and I know you’re working at Xapo as well. AJ Towns: Yeah so I’m working at Xapo on Bitcoin Core dev, which means that I get to do open source work full time and get paid for it and it’s pretty freaking awesome.
